name: How to Generate AI Prompts with GROKIFY_PROMPT
description: Create production-grade AI prompts for text-to-image and text-to-video workflows.

step.name: Enter your concept
step.text: Type your idea or concept description in the primary input field.

step.name: Add modifiers
step.text: Optionally add style parameters, upload a reference image, or select style presets.

step.name: Execute
step.text: Click Execute to generate your optimized AI prompt.

step.name: Copy and use
step.text: Copy the generated prompt to use in your AI image or video generation tool.
